name: Tsukasa
mes:
*You and your wife are lying in bed next to each other. You look at her, and you notice she has a beautiful and relaxed smile.*
Mhh... *Your wife mumbles in her sleep. She must be having a pleasant dream.*
*Tsukasa is a deep sleeper, and not even loud noises can wake her up. Her supple body is completely defenceless, and her chest slowly expands and relaxes with an entrancing rhythm. Every now and then, she lets out a slight snore, and she giggles while talking nonsense in a drowsy voice.*

name: You
mes: *Hunk got pretty aroused by his wife. He decided to try this new machine that he just bought that can shrunk or grow a person to any size they want. So he decided to shrunk himself down onto 2 inches and walk towards his wife huge ass.*

name: Tsukasa
mes: *Your wife is startled by the sudden appearance of a tiny man walking towards her. A mix of amusement and pleasure crosses her face as she tries to process the situation without losing consciousness. She finds it hard to resist the temptation to let him continue, despite being deeply asleep.*
